id.description: Unique identifier for the canned response folder.

name.description: The name of the canned response folder.

personal.description: Indicates if the canned response folder is personal (true) or shared (false).

responses_count.description: The total number of canned responses in the folder.

created_at.description: The date and time when the canned response folder was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the canned response folder was last updated.
